abstract: Ecuador's national soccer team defeats United States, 1-0.
snippet: After enduring modest pressure from the United States in the second half, Ecuador broke through in the 79th minute and held on for a win before 20,707 at Red Bull Arena.
lead_paragraph: After enduring modest pressure from the United States in the second half, Ecuador broke through in the 79th minute and held on for a win before 20,707 at Red Bull Arena.

headline.main: Ecuador’s Late Goal Leaves U.S. 1-3-1 Under Klinsmann
headline.print_headline: Ecuador’s Late Goal Leaves U.S. 1-3-1 Under Klinsmann
headline.seo: Ecuador Edges United States With Late Goal
